testcase.name: Login to a application
testcase.system-out: Given User enters "sritapa" username and "pwd011191" password...............passed When User clicks on login button............................................passed Then Verify user logged in successfully.....................................passed Then User clicks on inbox link..............................................passed Then User clicks on compose mail image......................................passed Then User search for recipient..............................................passed Then User enters mail title.................................................passed Then User clicks on send message button.....................................passed Then User verify message has been sent successfully.........................passed Then User clicks on logout button...........................................passed
